java.lang.String.value:
lib_CouchDB is an adapter to CouchDB database. Use this library to connect to a CouchDB server using the CouchDB REST API.
See CouchDB API at :
http://wiki.apache.org/couchdb/Complete_HTTP_API_Reference
This library will handle all the CouchDB REST API and JSON encoding protocol for you, just use the transactions in your projects. You can 'source' any of the the transactions's 'document' variables to any complex element.
Explore the sample Sequences included in this project to understand how to use this library.
* CreateAndDeleteDatabases: Create, Delete databases. * CreateAndModifyViews: Create a design document with several views having map function. * CreateGetAndDeleteData: Create data, Modify Data and Delete data, showing the revision number usage. * PopulateSampleData: Populate sample data by using normal and bulk mode * QueryViews: Shows how to Query the database, using the 2 views previously created * RunAllTests: Runs in sequence all the previous sequences.
Happy CouchDB programming with Convertigo !

Connects to the CouchDB server. Be sure to setup the following properties :
* Server (Default localhost) * Port (Default 7984)
